useCase.name: Perform Operation

preconditions.precondition: Developer initiates operation through CLI Tool.

successEndConditions.condition: Operation executed successfully on Dataset Instance.

useCase.trigger: Developer performs operation (e.g., compaction) through CLI Tool.

mainSequence.step: Developer initiates operation through CLI Tool.
CLI Tool requests operation on Dataset Instance from Dataset Management System.
Dataset Management System executes the operation on Dataset Instance.
Dataset Instance successfully completes the operation.
Dataset Management System confirms the success to CLI Tool.
CLI Tool displays success message to Developer.
